revised_title: Fossil Plants of Coal-Measures: Bowmanites and Chiopteris Ramosa
tldr: The author examines the fossil plants of coal-measures, specifically the organisms Bowmanites and Chiopteris ramosa. Bowmanites, a plant with an articulated stem and fructification, has distinctive reproductive organs. Chiopteris ramosa, a Pterid-like organism, may be a more developed form of Rachiopteris hirsuta.
